AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.ten undocumented aliens: hidden in the tractor-trailer, discovered at the immigration checkpoint stop and testified against Ramon De La Cruz
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz: defendant in the conspiracy case, accused of transporting aliens for commercial advantage or private financial gain, and argued for a mitigated role adjustment
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jorge Miguel Hernandez-Gomez: individual who arranged to pay thousands of dollars to be smuggled into the United States and was transported by Raymond McMillon
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Raymond McMillon: defendant who transported aliens, including Ramon De La Cruz and Jorge Miguel Hernandez-Gomez, and was convicted of alien transportation offenses
